chunks.zh: 大伙周边的人喜欢问自己一个月挣多少钱吗？
chunks.en: Do people around you like to ask how much you earn in a month?

chunks.zh: 逢年过节，同学聚会，见面特别喜欢问一句挣多少钱。都是打工人，也不是说挣到啥大钱不能说，单纯不想回答，暴露自己的收入情况，大多情况打个马虎眼也就过去了。但我有遇到有些好朋友会先自爆自己的收入情况，再来问你，这个时候感觉不说也不是，不说显得你和他不真诚 [笑哭] ，说真话违背自己的意愿，说假话自己又不是这种性格的人。好奇大伙是怎么处理这种事的？
chunks.en: During the holidays, class reunions, people especially like to ask how much you earn when they see you. We are all workers, and it's not that we can't say if we earn a lot of money, we just don't want to answer, exposing our income situation. In most cases, we just brush it off. But I have met some good friends who will first reveal their income and then ask you. At this time, I feel like it's not right not to say, as not saying makes you seem insincere to him [crying with laughter], telling the truth goes against your wishes, and telling lies, you're not that kind of person. I'm curious how everyone deals with this?

chunks.zh: “生怕兄弟苦，更怕兄弟开路虎”千万不要实话实说，他先说了，就说比你少点，入不敷出，存不下钱，月月光。
chunks.en: "Afraid that brothers are suffering, even more afraid that brothers are driving a Land Rover" Never tell the truth. If he tells you first, just say you earn less than him, you can't make ends meet, can't save any money, and you spend all your money every month.

chunks.zh: 说个平均数糊弄下就行
chunks.en: Just give an average number to fool them.

chunks.zh: 问就是一两万，周围人中的中庸数字就可以了
chunks.en: If asked, just say ten to twenty thousand, a moderate number among the people around you.

chunks.zh: 问就是几千块
chunks.en: If asked, just say a few thousand.

chunks.zh: 表示失业中🥴
chunks.en: Indicate you are unemployed 🥴

chunks.zh: 问就是万把块钱
chunks.en: If asked, just say around ten thousand.

chunks.zh: 我都是直接说做网管的每月三千多，再表示一下买房缺钱发愁，就行了。
chunks.en: I always say I'm a network administrator with a salary of over three thousand a month, and then express my worry about lack of money to buy a house, that's it.

chunks.zh: 统一回答月入三千, 除去吃穿住行月光
chunks.en: Answer uniformly that you earn three thousand a month, excluding food, clothing, housing, transportation, and you spend all your money.

chunks.zh: 问就是 5k
chunks.en: If asked, just say 5k.

chunks.zh: 是的，赞同，都是打工的，大差不差，除非背景悬殊
chunks.en: Yes, agree, we are all working, and it's not much different, unless there is a huge difference in background.

chunks.zh: 不真诚就不真诚呗，收入问题有什么需要真诚的。既然你已经知道他这是一种 manipulation 的套路了，就不要配合这种操纵。
chunks.en: If you're not sincere, then so be it. What's the need for sincerity about income? Since you already know that this is a manipulation tactic, don't cooperate with this kind of operation.

chunks.zh: 说了又有啥影响呢？
chunks.en: What impact does it have to say?

chunks.zh: 我现在联系的发小和同学，从来没问过你赚多少，因为对于朋友来说赚的多或者少从来不会影响，也没有谁瞧不起谁，谁强了都会拉其他人一把。如果这么问，那就以后别联系了。没必要。
chunks.en: The childhood friends and classmates I am in contact with now have never asked how much you earn, because for friends, earning more or less will never affect the relationship, and no one looks down on anyone, and whoever is stronger will pull the others. If they ask, then don't contact them anymore. There's no need.

chunks.zh: 问就说手头紧，想借钱
chunks.en: If asked, say you are short on cash and want to borrow money.

chunks.zh: 问吧，然后狠狠地炫耀一把，过段时间亲戚一有情况，第一时间脑子里想的就是跟你借钱
chunks.en: Ask, then show off a bit, and after a while, if relatives have a problem, the first thing that comes to mind is borrowing money from you.

chunks.zh: 信息交换，你也问别人，如果那个人说他挣得多就找他借钱，如果说挣得少就别借他钱
chunks.en: Exchange information, and you ask others. If that person says they earn a lot, then borrow money from them. If they say they earn little, don't lend them money.

chunks.zh: 这种千万要远离，少联系，搞不好以后他会突然找你借钱。
chunks.en: You must stay away from this type of person, keep in touch less, because he might suddenly ask you for money later.

chunks.zh: 以前就是问就 5k ，现在工作时间长了，就说万把块钱
chunks.en: Previously, if asked, I'd say 5k. Now that I've been working for a long time, I would say around ten thousand.

chunks.zh: 以前熟悉的，同行业的我也喜欢问一嘴，没啥别的意思纯好奇，后来发现并不是所有人都不介意，之后也就不问了
chunks.en: I used to like to ask people in the same industry I was familiar with; it was just curiosity, with no other meaning. Later, I found that not everyone minded, so I stopped asking.

chunks.zh: 关系好无所谓，对于根本不熟的亲戚朋友，问就是 5k 勉强度日，不喜欢被以平时八竿子打不着的人借钱
chunks.en: It doesn't matter if the relationship is good. For relatives and friends who are not familiar at all, if asked I would say 5k, just getting by. I don't like to be lent money by those who are usually unrelated.
